QueryToExecute:
select
  arn as resource,
  case
    when sse_description is null then 'alarm'
    else 'ok'
  end as status,
  case
    when sse_description is null then title || ' not encrypted with KMS.'
    else title || ' encrypted with KMS.'
  end as reason
  
  , region, account_id
from
  aws_dynamodb_table;
